alert.note: Alert for Pryor, Northern Bighorn Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 27 at 1:56PM MDT until April 28 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations up to 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...In Montana, Pryor/Northern Bighorn Mountains. In Wyoming, Northeast Bighorn Mountains. * WHEN...Until Midnight MDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Heavy snow, strong winds, and whiteout conditions are expected at times. These conditions and will make travel and back country activities dangerous and potentially life-threatening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Recreationists should prepare for adverse winter conditions.
info.instruction: Persons should consider delaying travel over the Bighorn mountains. Motorists should use extreme caution if travel is absolutely necessary on Highway 14. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.
